means: 向…介绍基本情况(brief的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和查尔斯在他的书房里闭门开简介会。

sentence.Network_en: The President received a briefing by telegram.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统收到用电报发来的一份简报。

sentence.Network_en: Ministerial colleagues were briefing against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他部长在攻击诋毁他。

entry.tran: 情况介绍会；任务下达会
entry.def: A briefing is a meeting at which information or instructions are given to people, especially before they do something.

example.ex: They're holding a press briefing tomorrow...
example.tran: 他们明天将召开一个新闻发布会。

example.ex: Security staff did not then receive any briefing before they started each shift.
example.tran: 保安人员当时开始轮岗前没有收到任何指示。

means.word_mean: 1. detailed instructions, as for a military operation

auth_sentence.content: But that briefing marked the beginning of his nightmare.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that briefing marked the beginning of his nightmare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that briefing marked the beginning of his nightmare.

auth_sentence.content: Welcome to the midnight briefing here at Casa Blanca.
auth_sentence.res_content: Welcome to the midnight briefing here at Casa Blanca.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Welcome to the midnight briefing here at Casa Blanca.

auth_sentence.content: We all settle in for the safety briefing.
auth_sentence.res_content: We all settle in for the safety briefing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We all settle in for the safety briefing.

sentences.en: The government spokesman gave a quick briefing to the reporters.
sentences.cn: 政府发言人向记者们作了情况简介。

sentences.en: All staff will be given a full briefing tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天将给全体职员作一个情况简介。

sentences.en: After all the briefing sessions at head office,our sales team is at concert pitch.
sentences.cn: 在总公司开过各种情况介绍会后,我们全体销售人员都跃跃欲试,准备大干一场。
